posts.post_content:
Looking to buy (preferably graded and non-altered) copies of the following:

Shag Shaughnessy
Rube Waddell (portrait)

Thanks in advance!
i should have all in varoius grades...send me a pm.

Jim, sorry - I missed your post about possibly having a Marquard (portrait), Waddell (portrait) and/or Wheat - could you shoot me an email at [url]awcornelius@gmail.com[/url] or text at 205-821-1006?

Thanks!
Wade
